location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Part of a letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, to Lewis Pelly

physicalDescription.extent: Condition Imperfect: The top right hand corner of folio sixty-nine has been torn off, and key information including the date and address are no longer visible, as are the first few words of the first line on the verso of the folio.

mods.abstract: Last folio of a letter regarding the movements of the Viceroy around India; a visit to Pelly from Mr Cox (Aitchison's father-in-law); letters to Pelly from his wife; and reports in the Bombay Papers that Pelly is to be married and will be the next Governor of Bombay.The earlier folio(s) of the letter, including the date and address, are missing, howeve,r as the letter refers to the announcement that Pelly is to be married, which took place in 1878.
